data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,200,300 citizens of Syddanmark, Denmark, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Syddanmark, Denmark
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Syddanmark.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, teach the 43,406 believers in Syddanmark, Denmark how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Syddanmark, Denmark to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,156,894 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, convict the 43,406 believers in Syddanmark to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Syddanmark.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Syddanmark, Denmark.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Syddanmark
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Iraqi, Algerian, Arabic-speaking, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Swahili, Urdu
